name: Bernie Feaganes
text: Very clean and food is good!   However, we do not like the counter service.   I tip very well and and appreciate good service when on vacation, so service would be a great addition!

name: Sarah Barnes
text: Garlic knots are knotted pieces of bread! Not folded over bread. But nonetheless it was really good!

name: vakamax13
text: It was 9:54 and the pizza hut was about to be closed. I called them if i could order a carryout and i was not disappointed. I got the two large pizzas and my family got to eat them with no problem. Thank you so much for the people work at this pizza hut.

name: Randy Gilbreath
text: Great service. Clean fresh salad bar at 2pm. Pizza great as always.

name: Belinda Kidd
text: This was the pizza hut in kill devil hills NC. They had a mini salad bar which was ok but not worth 5.99 4sure!! Very strange dining in, u can seat yourself check out a menu then u go back to the counter where cashier is u order your food …More

name: Joe LeMere
text:
Interior is very dirty. Carpet worn, walls and ceiling dirty, food on floor and table stands. This place looks like it hasn't been remodeled since the 80's.
And the food, the word terrible is not strong enough. …More

name: Connie Myers
text: The pizza is still delicious.  There is no wait staff anymore.  The restaurant is not clean. Carry out if you want pizza hut in kdh.

name: Jeremy Baker
text: The best Pizza Hut we've ever visited. Found this one about 2 years ago and now we visit about once a month. Hot, fast, friendly staff.

name: Jake U
text: Very good Pizza Hut store. Delivery is very fast. Driver was very nice to

name: Cierra Scarborough
text: LOVE the Kill Devil hills pizza hut, it's the only one around here worth buying from, they actually make great pizza and they actually put toppings on them, plus the pizza's look decent, they've never, I mean never messed up and order for me. Food and service is amazing,

name: Patricia Barclay
text: Only one girl taking orders and money on a holiday week, she did a great job!  Food was prepared as ordered and as good as any other Pizza Hut.

name: Brandon Kwiatkowski
text: Relatively clean. Has a salad buffet with average quality lettuce and ingredients. Pizzas were about average as well. Friendly staff to take orders but no wait staff like some other locations.

name: Suzy Miller
text: That place has changed from last time I was there you have to order your food from the counter, get your drink then walk up and get your food. The service was horrible. There was a group of people who left right after ordering because due …More

name: Tim and Martha Malone
text: We had a pair of take out pizzas.   Both were good and we're ready in less than 15 minutes.  Check for their specials to get a deal.

name: Amanda Gartman
text: Prolly the best pizza hut I've been to in a long time! Food was excellent!! Buffalo wings were great, breadsticks are always great, and pep pizza was great! Friendly staff, and clean! Only downfall was no waitstaff. Although the staff met all needs.

name: Frank Nolen
text: Food was hot and very good. Nice staff.

name: elizabeth smith
text: Very disappointed the salad bar is not fresh anymore. Always decent food and good service.

name: Alison M
text: Usually at a Pizza Hut, at least one thing goes wrong. Not sure if it was because we went so early, but they got every part of our (weird and complicated) order correct, and even put extra toppings on the bread sticks like we ask for every time and rarely receive.

name: Brent Quick
text: Sad and rundown but that seems to about par for the chain. Was a stop for a school field trip so not able to judge 'normal' service but they did a good job with ~ 100+ eigth graders who where like a plauge of locust.

name: Christi B
text: The building needs some updating,  but good food and friendly service.

name: Di Watson
text: I was very impressed with the server  "Tat", as she still remembered what my favorite order was even though I have not been able to go there very often.  My pizza was served quickly and was delicious.

name: timothy sutton
text: Great experience pretty quick    very friendly

name: Kathy Etheridge
text: Barely any cheese, sauce or toppings on our meat lovers and a cheese pizza. We had thin crust and it was too hard for even those with young teeth! On the salad bar tbete was a slimey film on the cucumbers and pickles. My Granddaughter had …More

name: Melissa Badger
text: Hair in pizza.   It appeared to be the girl that served it.  While making a new one,  a second hair was found in our other pizza.  Obviously the cook.   No apologies,  a fight to get a refund because we could show a receipt that they …More

name: Connie Brown
text: Super thin pizza, small, very little cheese. Very disappointed.

name: Dee Dee
text: The service was EXCELLENT and the food was delicious and HOT! 2/04/17

name: Delilah Battle
text: I really like the cinnamon sticks, especially when they're hot

name: Ashton Martin
text: Excellent pizza and service. We went to refill a drink and the server ran up and stopped us before we could get there and did it for us.

name: Bob R
text: Great pizza, good polite service.

name: Elyse Midgett
text: It didn't fall apart like other pizzas , their wings were great.

name: Theresa Steele
text: The restaurant is nice but I do not agree with the no servers, it's very odd.

name: Buck Jordan
text: Great pizza but if u order for delivery just remember one thing.. the driver doesn't get that $2.25 delivery charge.. Pizza Hut does. So remember those drivers are using their gas and putting wear, tare, and miles on their car to bring u …More

text: Clean restaurant, courteous staff, pizza arrived quickly.

name: Amy Lanz

name: Jason Maguire
text: Skip it. Look elsewhere if you want decent pizza. Food was greasy and the cheese lovers pizza could only be described as awful. Probably the worst pizza I've ever had. Zero stars.
